title: What day is today?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Emma. Today is your birthday, right? Happy birthday<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waa, thank you, Nico-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Like all birthdays, do tell me your wishes from now on<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Umm….I want to be able to soothe everyone, and become a wonderful school idol<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I see. Basically, you want to become a school idol like Nico huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu. Nico-chan is a school idol that I admire~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Today is February 5th….2 and 5 so….today is also Nico’s day~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Th- that’s true….! Emma, you’re pretty good! Let’s go eat some crepes. It’s my treat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
